title: List All the Vowel & Consonant Clusters

data.title: List All the Vowel & Consonant Clusters
data.solution:
# Vowels are 'aeiouyAEIOUY'

sentence = gets.chomp

# Write an answer using puts
# To debug: STDERR.puts "Debug messages..."

vowels = sentence.scan(/[aeiouy]+/i).uniq
consonants = sentence.scan(/[^aeiouy\W]+/i).uniq

puts vowels.sort
puts consonants.sort
data.statement:
Given an input [[sentence]], you have to separate it into consecutive letter-sequences of either {{consonants}} or {{vowels}} (e.g. {{phl}} or {{ey}}, respectively).

{{Vowels}} are defined here as {{aeiouy}} and all input will be lowercase and punctuation-free for simplicity. All other letters are {{consonants}}.

List all the unique sequences found in the [[sentence]] on separate lines, sorted with {{vowel}} sequences first and  {{consonant}} sequences second. Sort the sequences alphabetically/lexicographically within both groups.

data.constraints:
[[sentence]] size is between 4 and 1000 characters.
All characters are lowercase Latin letters (a-z) or spaces.
There will always be at least one sequence of {{consonants}} and one of {{vowels}} (at least two lines of output).

STATEMENT
Vowels are 'aeiouyAEIOUY'
data.inputDescription: <<1 line :>> A [[sentence]] of lowercase Latin letters (a-z) and spaces.
data.outputDescription: <<2 or more lines :>> All unique sequences of {{vowels}} found sorted alphabetically followed by all the unique sequences of {{consonants}} sorted the same way.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Given an input sentence, you have to separate it into consecutive letter-sequences of either consonants or vowels (e.g. phl or ey, respectively).

Vowels are defined here as aeiouy and all input will be lowercase and punctuation-free for simplicity. All other letters are consonants.

List all the unique sequences found in the sentence on separate lines, sorted with vowel sequences first and consonant sequences second. Sort the sequences alphabetically/lexicographically within both groups.
Input
1 line : A sentence of lowercase Latin letters (a-z) and spaces.
Output
2 or more lines : All unique sequences of vowels found sorted alphabetically followed by all the unique sequences of consonants sorted the same way.
Constraints
sentence size is between 4 and 1000 characters.
All characters are lowercase Latin letters (a-z) or spaces.
There will always be at least one sequence of consonants and one of vowels (at least two lines of output).
Example
Input
cackle
Output
a
e
c
ckl
